There is not a lot you can be before downloading a page.  You could check c=
onsistency between a resource name and the MIME type in the link, but the l=
atter is rarely provided.

A related time-saver is to check consistency wit=
h the MIME type as given in the response headers before downloading the who=
le object.  In this case, if it is not worth fully downloading, it can be r=
ejected by a DecideRules.
